name: Victorian Matador
description:
Welcome to Victorian Matador, a most wonderful spectacle! Watch this young matador, Louisa, taunt a mechanical llama to charge into enemies, while deftly avoiding its path. She'll wow you and gather score bonuses destroying similar enemies in sequence and just barely dodging incoming llamas! Break a leg!

Mouse and keyboard:

  • Move: WASD, arrow keys.
  • Signal the llama: Q or shift
  • Pause: space or escape.

Gamepad:

  • Move: left stick.
  • Signal the llama: A.
  • Pause: start.

This is one of the first games I made. Try Don't Devour My Flowers, a newer game with similar mechanics. 

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
